0-000000000001 00000 000 10000 0010011  addi x16,x0,1//x16= 1
4-000000000000 00000 000 10001 0010011 addi x17, x0,0//x17=0
8-000000000110 00000 000 10010 0010011 addi x18, x0,6//x18=6
12-0000000 10010 10001 000 10000 1100011 beq x17, $18, 16
16-0000000 10000 10001 000 10001 0110011 add x17, x17, x16//i1=1,i2=2,i3=3
20-0100000 10000 10010 000 10010 0110011 sub x18,x18, x16//i1=5,i2=4,i3=3
24-1111111 10000 10000 000 10001 1100011 beq x16, x16, -16
28-0000000 10000 10010 110 10100 0110011 or x20, x18, x16//x20=3
32-0000000 10100 10000 111 10011 0110011   and x19, x16, x20 x19=1
